text: Peter John DeLuise is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his role as Officer Doug Penhall in the Fox TV series 21 Jump Street, and for directing and writing episodes of science fiction television shows such as the Stargate franchise. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Peter DeLuise
